item.title: Report I-2024070104
item.description:
Report I-2024070104

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-30T12:20:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-19
  • City: Choudrant
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: SOUTHEASTERN FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Driver noticed at one of his stops( Boarders poultry supply) that there was a drip down one of the legs of an IBC metal tote tank. Driver called Safety, Hazmat one was called to assist in making all the necessary calls for the state of Lousianna. Costal Chemical was the shipper they came out to where our driver was located to transfer the contents of the damaged tote to a new tote. State police was on scene and reported that the leak was due to a weld and no fault of the carrier where the leg was mounted and that all calls were made and time frames were met.
